item.title: 7 Pimm's Cup recipes for spring.
item.description:
7 Pimm's Cup recipes for spring.

If Spring had an official cocktail, the Pimm's Cup would be it. It's ultra-refreshing, bright and vibrant-and as easy to make as it is to drink. To mix a basic version of the classic British cocktail, all you need is Pimm's No. 1, ginger ale (or some sort of lemon-lime soda), cucumber and lemon.

item.title: Food & Beer (Pre-order) | Food & Cookery | Phaidon Store
item.description:
Food & Beer (Pre-order) | Food & Cookery | Phaidon Store

The debut book by Danish gypsy brewer Jeppe Jarnit-Bjergsø of the bar Tørst, and Canadian chef Daniel Burns of the Michelin-starred restaurant Luksus-both in a shared space in Greenpoint, Brooklyn where they elevate beer to the level of wine in fine dining.

item.title: Brooklyn's Luft Coffee
item.description:
Brooklyn's Luft Coffee

About five years ago, Blair Smith's twice-a-day coffee pitstop at NYC's Kaffe 1668 led to him striking up a friendship with barista Justin Rodriguez behind the counter. Smith then met mobile developer Aaron Sutula in a coffee seminar held by an espresso machine company. "I took a day off of work to go," remembers Sutula.
